settings.content:
Azure dashboard - Cost and Optimization

This dashboard provides an overview of orphaned resources.
Please see the Checklist of Optmization Cost https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/framework/cost/optimize-checklist
Orphaned Assets This section provides an overview of your orphaned assets.

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Orphaned Disks
Resources
| where type has "microsoft.compute/disks"
| extend Diskid=id, DiskState = tostring(properties.diskState), DiskresourceGroup=resourceGroup, DiskLocation=location
| order by Diskid asc
| where managedBy == "" and DiskState != 'ActiveSAS' or DiskState == 'Unattached' and DiskState != 'ActiveSAS'
| project Diskid, DiskState, DiskresourceGroup, DiskLocation, subscriptionId

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Orphaned Network Interface Cards
ResourceContainers  | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName=name | join ( Resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networkinterfaces' and isempty(properties.virtualMachine) and isnull(properties.privateEndpoint)
    | extend id,  NICName=name, NICresourceGroup=resourceGroup, NICLocation=location, NICType=tostring(properties.nicType)) on subscriptionId
        | order by id asc
        | project NICName, NICresourceGroup, NICLocation, NICType, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Orphaned Availability Sets
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' 
| extend SubscriptionName=name 
| join ( resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/availabilitySets' and tostring(properties.virtualMachines)=='[]' 
| extend id, AvailName=name, AvailresourceGroup=resourceGroup, AvailLocation=location, AvailFaultDomainCount=tostring(properties.platformFaultDomainCount),AvailUpdateDomainCount=tostring(properties.platformUpdateDomainCount)) on subscriptionId
    | order by id asc
    | project AvailName, AvailresourceGroup, AvailLocation, AvailFaultDomainCount, AvailUpdateDomainCount, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Orphaned Public IPs
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' 
| extend SubscriptionName=name 
| join (resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses' and isempty(properties.ipConfiguration) 
| extend id, PIPName=name, PIPAllocationMethod=tostring(properties.publicIPAllocationMethod), PIPSKUName=sku.name, PIPresourceGroup=resourceGroup, PIPLocation=location)on subscriptionId 
        | order by id asc 
        | project PIPName, PIPSKUName, PIPAllocationMethod,PIPresourceGroup, PIPLocation, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Orphaned Network Security Groups
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName=name | join ( Resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups' and isnull(properties.networkInterfaces) and isnull(properties.subnets) | extend id, NSGName=name, NSGresourceGroup=resourceGroup, NSGLocation=location ) on subscriptionId
    | order by id asc
    | project NSGName, NSGresourceGroup, NSGLocation, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Orphaned Web API connection and Gateway

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Orphaned Web API connection and Gateway
resources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Web/connections'
| extend APIGatewayName=iff(isnotempty(todynamic(properties)["parameterValues"]),todynamic(properties)["parameterValues"]["gateway"]["name"] ,todynamic(properties)["parameterValueSet"]["values"]["gateway"]["value"]["name"])
|project APIid=id ,APIName=name,APIGatewayName,APIresourceGroup=resourceGroup,APILocation=location, subscriptionId
|join kind= leftouter
(
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.logic/workflows'
|extend propertiesJson=parse_json(properties)
|extend ConJson=propertiesJson["parameters"]["$connections"]["value"]
|mvexpand Conn=ConJson
|where   notnull(Conn)
|extend connectionId=extract("\"connectionId\":\"(.*?)\"",1,tostring(Conn))
|project connectionId,LogicApp_id=id,APILogicAppresourceGroup=resourceGroup,APILogicAppName=name, subscriptionId
)   on  $left.APIid==$right.connectionId
|project APIName ,APIresourceGroup,APILocation,APIGatewayName,APIUsedinLogicApp =iff(isnotempty(LogicApp_id), "Yes","No"),APILogicAppresourceGroup,APILogicAppName, subscriptionId
| order by APIUsedinLogicApp asc

settings.content: Assets to evaluate This section provides an overview of your assets to evaluate, with possible to reduce costs.

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Azure Disks larger than P30
Resources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/disks'
| extend Diskname=name, Disksize = properties.diskSizeGB, DiskresourceGroup=resourceGroup, Disklocation=location
| where sku.name == 'Premium_LRS'
| where Disksize >= 1024
| project Diskname, Disksize, DiskresourceGroup, Disklocation, subscriptionId
| order by tostring(Disksize)

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//AppService PremiumV2 instances
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions'
| extend SubscriptionName=name
| join ( resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Web/sites'
| extend WebAppId=id, WebAppresourceGroup=resourceGroup, WebAppName=name, WebAppServicePlan=tostring(properties.serverFarmId), WebAppSKU=tostring(properties.sku), WebAppType=kind, WebAppStatus=tostring(properties.state), WebAppLocation=location) on subscriptionId
| where WebAppSKU == 'PremiumV2'
| order by WebAppId asc
| project WebAppName, WebAppSKU, WebAppresourceGroup, WebAppLocation, WebAppType, subscriptionId

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//App Services Status
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions'
| extend SubscriptionName=name
| join ( resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Web/sites'
| extend WebAppId=id, WebAppresourceGroup=resourceGroup, WebAppName=name, WebAppServicePlan=tostring(properties.serverFarmId), WebAppSKU=tostring(properties.sku), WebAppType=kind, WebAppStatus=tostring(properties.state), WebAppLocation=location) on subscriptionId
| where WebAppSKU == 'PremiumV2'
| order by WebAppStatus desc  
| project WebAppName, WebAppStatus, WebAppSKU, WebAppresourceGroup, WebAppLocation, WebAppType, subscriptionId

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Storage Accounts (Kind and Replication), Key Vaults and Recovery Services Vault

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Storage Accounts (Kind and Replication), Key Vaults and Recovery Services Vault
resources 
| where type =~ 'microsoft.storagesync/storagesyncservices'
    or type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults'
    or type =~ 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'
    or type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults'
| extend Sttype = case(
    type =~ 'microsoft.storagesync/storagesyncservices', 'Azure File Sync',
    type =~ 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Azure Backup',
    type =~ 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts', 'Storage Accounts',
    type =~ 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults', 'Key Vaults',
    strcat("Not Translated: ", type))
| extend StSku = case(
    type !has 'Key Vaults', sku.name,
    type =~ 'Key Vaults', properties.sku.name,
    ' ')
| extend Stkind=kind, StresourceGroup=resourceGroup
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project StResource=id, Sttype, Stkind, StresourceGroup, StSku, subscriptionId
| order by Sttype asc

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Virtual Machine Power State - Stopped
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName=name | join ( resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' and tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus) != 'VM deallocated' and tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus) != 'VM running'| extend  VMname=name, VMPowerState=tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus), VMLocation=location, VMRG=resourceGroup, VMID=id) on subscriptionId
    | order by VMID asc 
    | project VMname, VMPowerState, VMLocation, VMRG, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Azure Kubernetes Service Power State
resources
| where type == "microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters"
| project AKSname=name,AKSPowerState=tostring(properties.powerState.code),AKSID=id,AKSlocation=location,AKSresourceGroup=resourceGroup,AKSSku=tostring(sku.name),AKSTier=tostring(sku.tier),SubscriptionName = subscriptionId
| order by AKSPowerState desc

settings.content: Azure Hybrid Benefits - Virtual Machines This section provides an overview of your assets to evaluate, Virtual Machines with possible to reduce costs when you have a Software Assurance active.

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Windows VMs without Azure Hybrid Benefit enabled

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Windows VMs without Azure Hybrid Benefit enabled
ResourceContainers 
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' 
| extend SubscriptionName=name | join ( resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' and  tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType) == 'Windows' and tostring(properties.['licenseType']) !has 'Windows' 
| extend VMWindowsId=id, VMName=name, VMLocation=location, VMresourceGroup=resourceGroup, VMOSType=tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.offer), VMOsVersion = tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.sku), VMSize=tostring (properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize), VMLicenseType = tostring(properties.['licenseType'])) on subscriptionId 
    | order by VMWindowsId asc 
    | project VMName,VMresourceGroup, VMLocation,VMOSType, VMOsVersion,VMLicenseType, VMSize, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Linux VMs without Azure Hybrid Benefit enabled

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Linux VMs without Azure Hybrid Benefit enabled
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName=name | join ( resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' and  tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType) != 'Windows' and tostring(properties.['licenseType']) has 'SLES_BYOS' | extend WindowsId=id, VMName=name, VMLocation=location, VMRG=resourceGroup, OSType=tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.offer), OsVersion = tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.sku), VMSize=tostring (properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize), LicenseType = tostring(properties.['licenseType'])) on subscriptionId 
    | order by WindowsId asc 
    | project VMName,VMRG, VMLocation,OSType, OsVersion,LicenseType, VMSize, SubscriptionName

settings.content:
Azure Hybrid Benefits - SQL Virtual Machines and SQL Databases
This section provides an overview of your assets to evaluate, SQL Virtual Machines and SQL Databases with possible to reduce costs when you have a Software Assurance active.

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: SQL Virtual Machines without Azure Hybrid Benefit enabled

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//SQL Virtual Machines without Azure Hybrid Benefit enabled
ResourceContainers | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' | extend SubscriptionName=name | join ( resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.SqlVirtualMachine/SqlVirtualMachines' and tostring(properties.['sqlServerLicenseType']) != 'AHUB'  | extend id, SQLVMName = name, SQLVMresourceGroup = resourceGroup, SQLVMLocation = location, SQLVMLicenseType = tostring(properties.['sqlServerLicenseType']), SQLVMOSType=tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.offer), SQLVMAgentType = tostring(properties.['sqlManagement']), SQLVMVersion = tostring(properties.['sqlImageOffer']), SQLVMSKU=tostring(properties.['sqlImageSku'])) on subscriptionId 
    | order by id asc    
    | project SQLVMName,SQLVMresourceGroup, SQLVMLocation, SQLVMVersion, SQLVMSKU, SQLVMAgentType, SQLVMLicenseType, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Azure SQL Databases without Azure Hybrid Benefit

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Azure SQL Databases without Azure Hybrid Benefit
ResourceContainers 
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' 
| extend SubscriptionName=name 
| join (resources |  where type =~ 'Microsoft.Sql/servers/databases' and name != 'master' and tostring(properties.['licenseType']) == 'LicenseIncluded' 
| extend   SQLDBid=id, SQLDBName = name, SQLDBresourceGroup = resourceGroup, SQLDBSKUName=sku.name, SQLDBSKUTier=sku.tier, SQLDBLocation = location, SQLDBLicenseType = tostring(properties.['licenseType']), SQLDBStorageAccountType=tostring(properties.['storageAccountType'])) on subscriptionId 
    | order by SQLDBid asc    
    | project SQLDBName,SQLDBresourceGroup, SQLDBLocation, SQLDBSKUName, SQLDBSKUTier, SQLDBLicenseType, SQLDBStorageAccountType, SubscriptionName

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Azure SQL Managed Instances without Azure Hybrid Benefit

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Azure SQL Managed Instances without Azure Hybrid Benefit
ResourceContainers 
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Resources/subscriptions' 
| extend SubscriptionName=name | join (resources |  where type =~ 'Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances' and tostring(properties.['licenseType']) == 'LicenseIncluded' 
| extend SQLDBid=id, SQLDBManagedInstance=id, SQLDBresourceGroup=resourceGroup, SQLDBLocation=location, SQLDBLicenseType = tostring(properties.['licenseType'])) on subscriptionId 
    | order by SQLDBid asc
    | project SQLDBManagedInstance,SQLDBresourceGroup, SQLDBLocation, SQLDBLicenseType, SubscriptionName
